[quote][h1]Lleg√≥ la hora de analizar esta joya[/h1][/quote]

[quote]Lo obtuve en Rebajas de a√±o nuevo chino.[/quote]


[h1]Singleplayer[/h1]
Bueno que se puede decir de esta bestia, tremendo juegazo, tremendo modo historia, tal y como lo es el 1,
te la pasas andando en la lancha o en el jeep disparando a lo loco, acci√≥n por todos lados, esos nervios que te pone este juego, y por supuesto las sorpresas que te llevas con los enemigos que salen hasta de abajo de la tierra (literalmente las hormigas le√≥n.) A todos creo que nos dej√≥ con un sabor de Half-life 3 en la boca, esperando a que salga.....

[h1]Gr√°ficos[/h1]
Con el querid√≠simo motor Source. Half-Life 2 nos ofrece unos modestos pero bonitos gr√°ficos, con muy buenos reflejos, y una optimizaci√≥n digna de Valve, que podr√≠a correr el juego en una patata, logicamente no est√°n a la altura de nuestra actual generaci√≥n pero no se quedan atras

[h1]Banda Sonora / Efectos[/h1]
Si de la banda sonora hablamos, no es la gran cosa, es m√°s, la mayor parte del juego esta desactivada, solo aparece en momentos c√∫lmines y ya, pero si hablamos de los efectos de ambientaci√≥n y disparos, etc, la verdad se lucieron, son muy buenos, y te sumergen en el juego al 100%

One of the most overrated games of all time. This game has some of the most boring level design, gunplay, weapons, enemies and stories I've ever played! I found myself bored almost the entire time. It may have been revolutionary at the time but in 2018 it's extremely lacklustre

Even now after all these years this game is still ridiculously entertaining, the combat in particular is 100% still playable and sastisfying when you've just had a shootout with five Combine. Whether this is your first time or you wish to reminisce childhood memories I recommed picking this up.
Does it even have to be recommended?

The game itself is honestly terrible. It is constant filler, the graphics have not aged well and the combat is atrocious. HOWEVER, this game must be respected for all that it has done for video games.

4/10 game, 10/10 legacy.

I know what is the best game. Can I say it? In my opinion, yes. Being The One Freeman is one of the best experiments in world I think. Story is awesome. Graphics are good enough to enjoy and feel the atmosphere. And game's physical environment is nice. Especially with the gravity gun, everything changes for Freeman. But I must confess that I didn't like the gauss on buggy car. It would be nice, if we could handle it. In Half-Life 1 when I got gauss everything turned into a point that player come over. Unfortunately, in Half-Life 2 when I got that buggy car, I didn't use it everytime. In addition to this, I know in HL2 Beta that there was a seperate gauss. Anyway, this game is nicer than some new fps games I think. It gives us puzzels to solve. And it has a nice concept.

Half-Life 2 ist ein grandioser Shooter und ein Muss f√ºr jeden PC-Gamer.

Die Story ist fantastisch. Die Atmosph√§re ist durchg√§ngig gut und das Gameplay z√§hlt zu einer der besten, die ich je gespielt habe.

Das Ende ist, wie bei jedem Half-Life Titel ein Cliffhanger und sehr gut gemacht.

Wer dieses Spiel mochte wird auch die Erweiterungen Episode 1 und Episode 2 m√∂gen, die im Gegensatz zu den meisten DLCs heutzutage noch guten Content liefern.

An exciting sucessor to the origional Half Life from 1998, Half Life 2 takes the famous Half Life protagonist on a new mission, to save Earth from an alien invasion lasting only seven hours...

Half Life 2 lives up to its predecessors reputation as one of Valve's greatest games! Though, now in 2018 (or whenever you are reading this) the graphics are some what, ops-elite but especially compared to the origional, Half Life 2 has great graphics and a beautiful look regardless of its age.

The gameplay has given me endless enjoyment even when playing it twice. The new main characters like Alyx Vance and Dr Breen are a definate improvement on the couple of scientists and guards seen in the Black Mesa complex.

Half Life 2 was such a sucess that it brought in both Half Life 2: Episode 1 and Half Life 2: Episode 2 and a Half Life 2: Episode 3 was due to be released but was ultimately cancelled, but it shows how good the origional game was! There are also many fan-made mods like Half Life 2: Update, Entropy : Zero and many more!

The ¬£6:99 off-sale price does not do this game justice! I would have hapily bought it at ¬£15:00. I wouldn't worry about the price as it is worth every peny (or cent)!

This game's only 'successor' (at current) is Hunt Down the Freeman, which, though a fantastic game itself, does not portray the Half Life feel.

Overall, I would reccomend this game to all ages and regardless of weather you like strategy games or FPS, this game appeals to everyone, or I think so anyway!
It's not a bad game and I would still recommend you to buy it, but after playing hl1 this game feels like a major let-down for me personally because it doesn't have the fast-paced action of hl1.

Great fucking game series. I honestly prefer this over hl1/black mesa purely for it's area and no not because of the graphics but because it takes us into a sort of 1984 soviet union-esq zone at one minute then gives us the hl1 science type of setting for others when we come across other creatures
This is the most amazing game on steam.
